backend/main.mo: Actor exposing handleError which inspects error text for categories and traps with detailed diagnostic messages.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, dark mode tokens, and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags, social preview images, and script bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the app in a QueryClientProvider and renders FeaturedPhotoPage.
frontend/src/components/DeployRetryPanel: UI panel that runs a simulated deployment, classifies failures, and offers retry/reset actions.
Classifies deployment errors into categories and marks whether retry is safe.
frontend/src/deployment/formatDeployment: Maps classified failures into human‑readable titles, descriptions, actions, and technical details.
frontend/src/deployment/useRetryableOper: Hook that wraps an async operation with retry logic, state tracking, and error formatting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, logging in, clearing identity, and tracking login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a test React Query hook that calls a backend error handler for deployment‑error testing.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind base styles and defines CSS variables for light/dark themes using OKLCH color values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/FeaturedPhotoPage.tsx: Renders either a deployment retry panel via query param or a full‑screen featured photo.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, known issues, and existing features related to deployment failure resilience and reporting.
